fullDescription.intro:
Create a Google Sheets connection using interactive authentication. Authentication happens in the dialog. A pop-up will appear that asks the user to grant access to Google Sheets and Google Drive. Two tokens are recieved and stored in "~/.credentials/sheets.googleapis.com-knime-analytics-platform". Access can be revoked any time by visiting myaccount.google.com/permissions
For details see: developers.google.com/analytics/resources/concepts/gaConceptsAccounts.
fullDescription.option: Opens the Google Authentication Dialog in your browser.

ports.inPort: The Google API connection that will be used.
ports.outPort: A connection that can be used to access the Google Analytics API.
